reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan well-made and appreciate its style, with one noting it instantly dresses up outfits. Customers praise its soft material, light feel, and excellent weight for slightly cooler weather.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warmth and stylish
items.body: I love this sweater. The yarn is soft and doesn't itch me at all. It can be worn alone or over other tops. It has a great texture. is well made, and can be dressed up or dressed down. It's not heavy or bulky, yet it keeps me warm. The buttons are sturdy and fit easily in the buttonholes. Overall, I am very pleased and happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sizes are true to fit.
items.body: Perfect fit! Excellent quality. Very cozy and warm. I bought several in different colors, and I am so glad that I did. Colors are exactly as pictured. There is no spandex in these sweaters. I hate spandex in any of my clothes. Read more
items.author: Sherri Kluttz

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Classic fit.
items.body: This cardigan is a classic fit that resembles something you could buy at Talbot. It is well made and has nice buttons. I bought it in A-Khaki. I was hesitant whether or not I liked the color because it looked a bit goldish to me, but when I paired it up with some beige pieces it really looks good. So it’s a matter of what colors you choose for your outfit. That is a bit limiting. But again, I am talking about one of the many colors offered. It is acrylic and has a chunky weave that is flattering to the fit. It does not hug you body but hung straight which for someone with a tummy like me is a plus. The cuffs are good fitted and ribbed and do not hang loose. Collar is ribbed too which makes the cardigan look more elegant. It feels soft against your skin if wearing it with a short sleeve shirt. It is a fall sweater that can easily be worn in the winter if layered appropriately Read more
items.author: P&C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater
items.body: Love this sweater. I can dress it up or down. It’s soft and the fit is good. Good value. Love the color too. Read more
items.author: Larry G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars There is some danger I may never take this off again.
items.body: Addendum: I have now ordered many colors and find this such a wonderful sweater. The 2025 versions have a nice tortoise shell style button. I'm glad to have some of both button styles. The coffee color is notable. I'd have called it "milk chocolate." It goes with everything, even my odd shades of pink and cranberry. It works with warm or cool colors. This is the sweater to take on your weekend getaway. I've noticed some differences in the texture from one color to another. Some are softer. All hold up well. The high texture weave is lovely to me. It lends a less formal look. I wear a lot of skirts in a town where jeans and t-shirts prevail. The low-key impression of these sweaters helps to bridge the gap. I ordered this in the khaki and black stripe because it's different than my usual fare. I just feel so good in this sweater. It's cozy. It's warm, but not stifling. I ordered my usual size, large. I'm small through the hips, but have broad shoulders, so I know what I need! But then I read review after review about how large these run. Of course, by then the sweater had shipped. Then when it arrived, I was pleased to find, it fit just right. The side seams fall straight down and right at the center on the sides. No pulling or stretching anywhere. I can layer with plenty of room. My sleeves come all the way down over the wrists and a bit over the hands. Maybe I'm strange, but I'm not a fan of clothes that fit like skin. Especially not my cardies, which are going to layer over other things. I like the gold buttons with this color, but might change them on another color. This is such a great sweater it will be worth the effort. I do plan to order another color--at least one. This is the perfect weight for every season--Not too light, but not too heavy. Acrylic is awesome for all year, indoors especially. Read more
items.author: mrs.truthquest

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Fits well and pretty Read more
items.author: Sue Wynsma

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cardigan
items.body: The material isn’t as soft as I would have liked, but it’s a nice sweater. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Very pleased with the sweater. Large was great fit. I am short and it was not to long. I got the blue and it is a beautiful blue. Washes very well. It’s soft and light weight but warm. Read more
items.author: Mary

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Army Green, Brown Black, Black, Black White, Coffee, Beige, Color Block Black, Red White, Grey, Color Block Beige, A-khaki, White Black, Mix Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
